title: spack create downloads all versions

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Beginning with commit 08f449ae9a4b18e5a8c1056278b6e925d1760678, PR #14311, the `spack create` command no longer prompts for the number of versions to use. Instead, it proceeds to download and checksum everything that it finds.

On an older version of spack:
```console
$ spack create -n mumax -t generic https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.3.tar.gz
==> Using specified package name: 'mumax'
==> Found 11 versions of mumax:
  
  3.9.3_linux_cuda7.5  https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.3/mumax3.9.3_linux_cuda7.5.tar.gz
  3.9.3                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.3.tar.gz
  3.9.2                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.2.tar.gz
  3.9.1c               https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.1/mumax3.9.1c_linux.tar.gz
  3.9.1                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.1.tar.gz
  3.9c                 https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9c/mumax3.9c_linux.tar.gz
  3.8beta1             https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.8beta1.tar.gz
  3.8                  https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.8.tar.gz
  3.7beta2             https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.7beta2.tar.gz
  ...
  3.7                  https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.7.tar.gz

==> How many would you like to checksum? (default is 1, q to abort) 
```

With the latest develop:
```console
$ spack create -n mumax -t generic https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.3.tar.gz
==> Using specified package name: 'mumax'
==> Found 11 versions of mumax:
  
  3.9.3_linux_cuda7.5  https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.3/mumax3.9.3_linux_cuda7.5.tar.gz
  3.9.3                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.3.tar.gz
  3.9.2                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.2.tar.gz
  3.9.1c               https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.1/mumax3.9.1c_linux.tar.gz
  3.9.1                https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.1.tar.gz
  3.9c                 https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9c/mumax3.9c_linux.tar.gz
  3.8beta1             https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.8beta1.tar.gz
  3.8                  https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.8.tar.gz
  3.7beta2             https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.7beta2.tar.gz
  ...
  3.7                  https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.7.tar.gz

==> Downloading...
==> Fetching https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.3/mumax3.9.3_linux_cuda7.5.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Fetching https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.3.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Fetching https://github.com/mumax/3/archive/v3.9.2.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Fetching https://github.com/mumax/3/releases/download/v3.9.1/mumax3.9.1c_linux.tar.gz
^C
==> Error: Keyboard interrupt.
```
